build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev && composer dump-autoload && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; cp -f .env.railway.postgres.example .env 2>/dev/null || true; php artisan key:generate --force || true; echo ====ENV-SUMMARY====; echo COMMIT=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) PHP=$(php -v | head -n1); echo DB_HOST=[$DB_HOST] DB_PORT=[$DB_PORT] DB_DATABASE=[$DB_DATABASE] DB_USERNAME=[$DB_USERNAME] PGSSLMODE=[$PGSSLMODE]; chmod +x scripts/pg_diag.sh || true; mkdir -p storage/framework/sessions storage/framework/views storage/framework/cache bootstrap/cache || true; chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache || true; echo ====PG-DIAG-PRE====; ./scripts/pg_diag.sh || true; php artisan config:clear; echo ====MIGRATE====; if ! php artisan migrate --force -vvv; then echo ====MIGRATION-FAILED====; ./scripts/pg_diag.sh || true; exit 1; fi; echo ====SEED====; php artisan db:seed --force --no-interaction || true; php artisan storage:link || true; php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT'
